xdi2.transport.registry.impl.uri

Class UriMessagingContainerRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.transport.registry.impl.AbstractMessagingContainerRegistry
      • xdi2.transport.registry.impl.uri.UriMessagingContainerRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, MessagingContainerRegistry

    public class UriMessagingContainerRegistry
extends AbstractMessagingContainerRegistry
implements MessagingContainerRegistry, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Registry to mount and unmount messaging containers.
    Author:
    markus
